DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to determine the effect of suvorexant on insomnia symptoms in peri- and postmenopausal women who are experiencing sleep difficulties related to nighttime hot flashes.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Suvorexant in the Treatment of Hot Flash-associated Insomnia
